I figured you were being literal.

That's just really selfish of you.
You're trying to make someone like you, make them want to be with you, when you _know_ that's not possible.
You're going to crush their heart and leave them all alone.

And that's just not right.
Do you want to drag other people down with you....

topics.body:
My parents argued again.

I'm kinda scared at this because maybe one day, they might go their separate ways and I don't want that, even if I'm old enough to understand and take care of myself. I love both my parents and I wish they would stop arguing with each other. My dad keeps saying otherwise when blamed for something obvious and my mom always thinks she's right. I think their jobs are getting to them.

I hope they retire from their work before reaching 70 and can enjoy their lives a bit.
